verses.verse: Then the word<WH1697> of the Lord<WH3068> of hosts<WH6635> came<WH1961> saying,<WH559>
"Thus<WH3541> says<WH559> the Lord<WH3068> of hosts,<WH6635> 'I am exceedingly<WH1419> jealous<WH7065> for Zion,<WH6726> yes, with great<WH1419> wrath<WH2534> I am jealous<WH7065> for her.'

"Thus<WH3541> says<WH559> the Lord,<WH3068> 'I will return<WH7725> to Zion<WH6726> and will dwell<WH7931> in the midst<WH8432> of Jerusalem.<WH3389> Then Jerusalem<WH3389> will be called<WH7121> the City<WH5892> of Truth,<WH571> and the mountain<WH2022> of the Lord<WH3068> of hosts<WH6635> [will be called] the Holy<WH6944> Mountain.<WH2022>'

"Thus<WH3541> says<WH559> the Lord<WH3068> of hosts,<WH6635> 'Old<WH2205> men<WH2205> and old<WH2205> women<WH2205> will again<WH5750> sit<WH3427> in the streets<WH7339> of Jerusalem,<WH3389> each<WH376> man<WH376> with his staff<WH4938> in his hand<WH3027> because<WH4480> of age.<WH7230> <WH3117>
'And the streets<WH7339> of the city<WH5892> will be filled<WH4390> with boys<WH3206> and girls<WH3207> playing<WH7832> in its streets.<WH7339>'

"Thus<WH3541> says<WH559> the Lord<WH3068> of hosts,<WH6635> 'If<WH3588> it is too<WH6381> difficult<WH6381> in the sight<WH5869> of the remnant<WH7611> of this<WH2088> people<WH5971> in those<WH1992> days,<WH3117> will it also<WH1571> be too<WH6381> difficult<WH6381> in My sight<WH5869>?' declares<WH5002> the Lord<WH3068> of hosts.<WH6635>

"Thus<WH3541> says<WH559> the Lord<WH3068> of hosts,<WH6635> 'Behold,<WH2009> I am going to save<WH3467> My people<WH5971> from the land<WH776> of the east<WH4217> and from the land<WH776> of the west<WH3996>;<WH8121>

and I will bring<WH935> them [back,] and they will live<WH7931> in the midst<WH8432> of Jerusalem,<WH3389> and they will be My people<WH5971> and I will be their God<WH430> in truth<WH571> and righteousness.<WH6666>'

"Thus<WH3541> says<WH559> the Lord<WH3068> of hosts,<WH6635> 'Let your hands<WH3027> be strong,<WH2388> you who are listening<WH8085> in these<WH428> days<WH3117> to these<WH428> words<WH1697> from the mouth<WH6310> of the prophets,<WH5030> [those] who<WH834> [spoke] in the day<WH3117> that the foundation<WH3245> of the house<WH1004> of the Lord<WH3068> of hosts<WH6635> was laid,<WH3245> to the end that the temple<WH1964> might be built.<WH1129>

'For before<WH6440> those<WH1992> days<WH3117> there was no<WH3808> wage<WH7939> for man<WH120> or any wage<WH7939> for animal;<WH929> and for him who went<WH3318> out or came<WH935> in there<WH369> was no<WH369> peace<WH7965> because<WH4480> of his enemies,<WH6862> and I set<WH7971> all<WH3605> men<WH120> one<WH376> against another.<WH7453>
'But now<WH6258> I will not treat the remnant<WH7611> of this<WH2088> people<WH5971> as in the former<WH7223> days,<WH3117>' declares<WH5002> the Lord<WH3068> of hosts.<WH6635>

'For [there will be] peace<WH7965> for the seed:<WH2233> the vine<WH1612> will yield<WH5414> its fruit,<WH6529> the land<WH776> will yield<WH5414> its produce,<WH2981> and the heavens<WH8064> will give<WH5414> their dew;<WH2919> and I will cause the remnant<WH7611> of this<WH2088> people<WH5971> to inherit<WH5157> all<WH3605> these<WH428> [things.]

'And it will come<WH1961> about that just<WH9201> as you were a curse<WH7045> among the nations,<WH1471> O house<WH1004> of Judah<WH3063> and house<WH1004> of Israel,<WH3478> so<WH3651> I will save<WH3467> you that you may become<WH1961> a blessing.<WH1293> Do not fear;<WH3372> let your hands<WH3027> be strong.<WH2388>'

"For thus<WH3541> says<WH559> the Lord<WH3068> of hosts,<WH6635> 'Just<WH9201> as I purposed<WH2161> to do<WH7489> harm<WH7489> to you when your fathers provoked<WH1> Me to wrath,<WH7107>' says<WH7107> the Lord<WH559> of hosts,<WH3068> 'and I have not relented,<WH6635>
so<WH3651> I have again<WH7725> purposed<WH2161> in these<WH428> days<WH3117> to do<WH3190> good<WH3190> to Jerusalem<WH3389> and to the house<WH1004> of Judah.<WH3063> Do not fear!<WH3372>

'These<WH428> are the things<WH1697> which<WH834> you should do:<WH6213> speak<WH1696> the truth<WH571> to one<WH376> another;<WH7453> judge<WH8199> with truth<WH571> and judgment<WH4941> for peace<WH7965> in your gates.<WH8179>

'Also let none<WH376> <WH408> of you devise<WH2803> evil<WH9567> in your heart<WH3824> against another,<WH7453> and do not love<WH157> perjury<WH7621>;<WH8267> for all<WH3605> these<WH428> are what<WH834> I hate,<WH8130>' declares<WH5002> the Lord.<WH3068> "
Then the word<WH1697> of the Lord<WH3068> of hosts<WH6635> came<WH1961> to me saying,<WH559>

"Thus<WH3541> says<WH559> the Lord<WH3068> of hosts,<WH6635> 'The fast<WH6685> of the fourth,<WH7243> the fast<WH6685> of the fifth,<WH2549> the fast<WH6685> of the seventh,<WH7637> and the fast<WH6685> of the tenth<WH6224> [months] will become<WH1961> joy,<WH8342> gladness,<WH8057> and cheerful<WH2896> feasts<WH4150> for the house<WH1004> of Judah;<WH3063> so love<WH157> truth<WH571> and peace.<WH7965>'
"Thus<WH3541> says<WH559> the Lord<WH3068> of hosts,<WH6635> '[It will] yet<WH5750> [be] that peoples<WH5971> will come,<WH935> even the inhabitants<WH3427> of many<WH7227> cities.<WH5892>

'And the inhabitants<WH3427> of one<WH259> will go<WH1980> to another<WH259> saying,<WH559> "Let us go<WH1980> at once<WH1980> to entreat<WH9134> the favor<WH9134> <WH6440> of the Lord,<WH3068> and to seek<WH1245> the Lord<WH3068> of hosts;<WH6635> I will also<WH1571> go.<WH1980>"

'So many<WH7227> peoples<WH5971> and mighty<WH6099> nations<WH1471> will come<WH935> to seek<WH1245> the Lord<WH3068> of hosts<WH6635> in Jerusalem<WH3389> and to entreat<WH9134> the favor<WH9134> <WH6440> of the Lord.<WH3068>'

"Thus<WH3541> says<WH559> the Lord<WH3068> of hosts,<WH6635> 'In those<WH1992> days<WH3117> ten<WH6235> men<WH376> from all<WH3605> the nations<WH1471> will grasp<WH2388> the garment<WH3671> of a Jew<WH3064> saying,<WH559> "Let us go<WH1980> with you, for we have heard<WH8085> that God<WH430> is with you. "'"
